C

calculateInfluence - Variable in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
 
calculateInfluence(Island) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
Method calculateInfluence calculate the player with the highest influence on the given island If two or more players have the highest influence, then only one of them is returned, together with the isDraw flag which tells to the Controller who called the calculateInfluence method if the outcome of the calculation was a draw or not.
calculateInfluenceForCard6() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.ExpertGameTest
Test calculateInfluenceForCard6 verifies the correct application of Personality 6 effect: islands' towers are ignored during influence's computation.
calculateInfluenceForCard6(Island) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.ExpertGame
Method that calculates influence of an island but doesn't consider the towers
calculateInfluenceForCard8(Island) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.ExpertGame
Method that calculates influence of an island and adds 2 additional points
calculateInfluenceForCard9(Island) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.ExpertGame
Method that calculates influence on an island but doesn't consider the bannedColor students
CalculateInfluenceWithTowersTest() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.GameTest
This method verifies the correct calculation of the influence excluding the towers.
calculateIslandOwner(Island, HashMap<String, Integer>) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
Method that calculates the Owner of an island according to his influence on that island If there is a draw of influence there's no change about the island's owner
calculateIslandOwnerTest() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.GameTest
This method verifies if the calculateIslandOwner method returns the correct playerID of the player that is the owner of the island
calculateStudentsInfluences(Island, ArrayList<Player>) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
Method that calculates the influence of each player on an island
calculateStudentsInfluences(Island, ArrayList<Player>, Color) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.ExpertGame
Method that calculates the influence of each player on an island but doesn't consider the bannedColor students
calculateWinner() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
Method calculateWinner checks and, if present, sets the winner name by counting each player's number of towers and teacher tiles.
canClick(ClientState, Clickable) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.ActionParser
Method canClick verifies if the Clickable element received as input can be clicked according to current client state.
canDrag(ClientState, Clickable) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.ActionParser
Method canDrag verifies if the Clickable element received as input can be dragged from its current position according to current client state.

ClientSocket - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.client
Class ClientSocket handles client communication with server It receives messages from the server and passes it to higher level classes (CLI or GUI) and sends messages received from the above-mentioned higher level classes
ClientSocket(String, int, UI) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.client.ClientSocket
Method ClientSocket sets a socket variable given ip and port It also sets a ping system to handle disconnections
ClientState - Enum Class in it.polimi.ingsw.client
Enum ClientState defines in a finite state machine way the possible states in which a client can be found.

Constructor creates a ClientState.
